tidbits.title: Multilingual and Multicultural
tidbits.description: Luxembourg is a multilingual and multicultural country, blending influences from French, German, and Luxembourgish traditions.

tidbits.title: Financial Hub
tidbits.description: The country is a prominent financial hub, housing several European Union institutions and global financial and banking entities.

tidbits.title: Picturesque Landscapes
tidbits.description: Luxembourg offers picturesque landscapes with charming villages, historic castles, and the stunning Ardennes forest in the north.
